BBEX3.A.GTQ.USD.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates (reference rates) for the US dollar in Guatemala / USD 1 = GTQ ... (middle)
Source: Since March 2003: Banco de Guatemala. 1994 - February 2003: Dresdner Bank Lateinamerika AG, Hamburg (formerly: Deutsch-Südamerikanische Bank AG).
Methodology: Until November 2006, calculated on the basis of buying and selling rates, thereafter on the basis of month-end middle rates.
